intro: Euodia knudsenii, commonly known as Knudsen's euodia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rutaceae. It is native to the island of Madagascar and is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and fragrant, white flowers. The plant produces small, woody fruits that contain several seeds. Euodia knudsenii is typically found in moist, shaded habitats within humid forests. It is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and limited distribution.
